Staff Writer

Junior Adriana Reami celebrates winning a point against Duke sophomore Kelly Chen on Friday May   at Ambler Tennis Stadium in Durham PERIOD Reami lost to Chen   during the Wolfpacks  overall loss PERIOD

The NC State womens tennis team is set to compete in the ITA National Team Indoor Championship in Chicago this weekend from Feb PERIOD  PERIOD

No PERIOD  NC State  is coming off a dominant  victory against Kansas PERIOD In the match the Wolfpack won the doubles point with topranked doubles partners senior Anna Rogers and sophomore Alana Smith winning their eighth straight doubles match and No PERIOD  doubles partners junior Jaeda Daniel and senior Adriana Reami winning their match as well PERIOD The Wolfpack would also only lose one singles match in singles play PERIOD

This tournament features several topranked womens tennis teams including No PERIOD  Stanford No PERIOD  North Carolina No PERIOD  Georgia No PERIOD  UCLA No PERIOD  Duke No PERIOD  Pepperdine No PERIOD  Texas No PERIOD  Florida State No PERIOD  Michigan No PERIOD  Virginia No PERIOD  Arizona State No PERIOD  Princeton and No PERIOD  Georgia Tech PERIOD

NC State  will kick off the tournament facing Princeton  Friday Feb PERIOD  PERIOD If the Wolfpack wins it will face the winner of Arizona State and North Carolina on Saturday PERIOD Although Georgia won last year the championship is up for grabs for most of the teams competing PERIOD

NC State has an advantage in doubles play with the No PERIOD  doubles duo of Rogers and Smith and No PERIOD  doubles duo of Daniel and Reami PERIOD Rogers Reami and Smith are also topranked singles players as well with Rogers being ranked at No PERIOD  Reami at No PERIOD  and Smith at No PERIOD  PERIOD The Wolfpack is in good shape to make a name for itself in the tournament if it hasnt already PERIOD

The first match for NC State will begin Friday Feb PERIOD  at  a.m PERIOD at the XS Tennis Village PERIOD

Staff Writer
